amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for science and technology research, development, test and evaluation, acquisition, and operations by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase research, development, acquisition and operations by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 269 (Roll no. 267).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
